channel.title: Selector on Codetab
channel.description: Recent content in Selector on Codetab

item.title: Selector - Scoopi Web Scraper - why just scrape when you can scoop
item.description: Query, Block and Selector So far in this guide, we have covered the basics locators, tasks and datadefs. In this chapter we review selectors and also, show how to get selector or xpath using Firefox or Chrome browsers and fine tune it with Query Analyzer. Selector In Scoopi, selector is a common term which refers either to the selector (Jsoup) or to the xpath (HtmlUnit or Selenium driver) that is used to scrape data from the page.
